price: 94.Tawraat kitab yikriyeeniih cakki keenih Baxxaqqa iyyeek lakal Yallal dirab ginnaasita mari, Toysa woo mari usun Yallal deedal haysitta daalimiin kinni.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
